title: Drawing, "Studies of Trees with Details of Bamboo and a Small Detail of a Man Carrying Bananas on His Head, Bellevue, Jamaica", August 1865
markings: Stamped in ink at center right: Lugt 457d
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite at upper right: Boy carrying bananas; and at bottom right: Aug // 65 / Bellevue, Jamaica
description: Horizontal view of trees and details of bamboos with a man without visible feet, carrying bananas upon his head at top right in small scale.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Studies of Trees with Details of Bamboo and a Small Detail of a Man Carrying Bananas on His Head, Bellevue, Jamaica", August 1865.
August 1865. Graphite on green paper. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-424-a.
